name: Brain Pump
storyline: BrainPump is an addictive puzzle game to test and train your quick recognition abilities while having fun. Competing for the high score with your friends, you recognize rows and columns of blocks - or 4 in a square - to score. You're on a time limit. Scoring increses your time, while unneeded taps reduce it. Now hurry up and stay ahead! You get better the more you play, and train your pattern-recognition in real life too. It's a typical game to pass some time in a friendly competition, while sharpening your wits.
summary: Brain Pump is a puzzle game: you rotate the blocks to make horizontal or vertical rows, or 4 blocks in a square, to score. It trains your pattern-recognition while having fun, and lets you compete with other players in the highscores list. It's cute, simple and effective for all ages, and it has little bonus game on board to relax from the puzzling once in a while. Fun to play and pretty addictive.
